name: 林顯易
objective:
This course consists of lectures on the theory of digital signal processing (DSP). In the beginning of this course, digital-time signals, systems, and transforms are reviewed. Also, digital filter design including FIR and IIR filters are presented. 
* The course is prerequisite for signing up the course of labs on digitail signal processing which is offered in the spring semester.
*本課程為下半年數位訊號處理實驗的先修課程.若無修過本課程則無法加選下半年度的數位訊號處理實驗課程
schedule:

3　　Discrete-time linear systems 　　Chap. 2
4　　Z-transform　　Chap. 3

6　　Discrete-time Fourier transform (DTFT)　　Chap. 4
